sentences.en: Around the pond grows a profusion of luxuriant trees.
sentences.cn: 荷塘四面,长着许多树,蓊蓊郁郁的.

sentences.en: Green and luxuriant are the pines and cypresses.
Hair that's thick and luxuriant needs regular trimming.
sentences.cn: 健康浓密的头发需要定期修剪。

sentences.en: Heaving in a distant sight more luxuriant green than ever.
sentences.cn: 在遥远的绞比以往更华丽绿色眼前.

sentences.en: Israel is a luxuriant vine; He brings forth fruit for himself.
sentences.cn: 1以色列是茂盛的葡萄树, 结果繁多.

sentences.en: Luxuriant and verdant , ho , whiffs of perfume assailing my nostrils.
sentences.cn: 葳蕤而蓊茏兮芳馨而醉鼻 ﹒.
山坡上长满茂密的树林.

sentences.en: Now the luxuriant branches were bent with fruit!
sentences.cn: 瞧,那一棵棵枝叶茂盛的果树上,累累的果实把树枝都压弯了.

sentences.en: Such conditions foster the growth of the world's most luxuriant vegetation.
sentences.cn: 这种环境养育着世界上最繁茂的植被.

sentences.en: The branches and leaves are luxuriant but well - spaced.
There were two very large oak trees in front of our house with wide spreading branches and luxuriant foliage.
sentences.cn: 我们家门口有两棵枝繁叶茂的大橡树。

sentences.en: Thus, the structural configuration offers luxuriant headspring to architecture creation.
sentences.cn: 可见, 结构形态为建筑形象的创新提供了丰富的源泉.

sentences.en: When luxuriant and thick trees hide us from view again.
sentences.cn: 当茂密的树木再次遮挡那一缕光线.

words.tran_cn: 奢侈的；丰富的；放纵的；特级的
繁茂的；丰富的；奢华的；肥沃的

phrases.tran_cn: 旺盛生长，繁茂生长；植物生长茂盛

trans.tran_cn: 茂盛的，郁郁葱葱的，绚烂的，华丽的
trans.tran_en: beautiful and pleasant to watch or listen to
